name: Idle Routines
description:
This is a recreation of Channel 7's Idle Routines.

The password is: MonoMakesSubmissionViacorp7

Once you type in the password, press the enter key(or return key if you are using a mac)

Notes:

The year is 2081, almost all of America is controlled by the government in a hypnotic like state. Gas is released onto America that causes people to lose their life energy and do the same things again and again. However, something falls onto earth. Causing many people to revert from their idle routines. This game takes place just before that thing falls onto earth.

For more information, please watch this video:
